title: AI tool makes detection of skin cancer more accurate
description: Researchers at Fox Chase Cancer Center, Temple University's College of Engineering, and the Lewis Katz School of Medicine at Temple University have developed a new method that enhances the ability of artificial intelligence models to detect and diagnose skin cancer in individuals with darker skin.

title: A.I. Spending Is Accelerating Among Tech’s Biggest Companies
description: Despite the risk of a bubble, Google, Meta, Microsoft and Amazon plan to spend billions more on artificial intelligence than they already do.
content:
Four of the tech industry’s wealthiest companies made it clear this week that their spending on artificial intelligence was not about to slow down.
